name: The Minute Hand
I0D: The Minute Hand is the minute hand of the Refuge clock tower. It offers +2 to attack and damage rolls, and if dropped or thrown can be recalled back to the user.
I1D: It is a woven, light metal you think might be Mithril and ends in a razor sharp point. It has a long straight base you can get a nice grip on and to recall the lance the user must say "To me, Spear Friend".
